ygData.subject: Wizard Guild in Freeport
ygData.msgSnippet: I recently made the trip from Faydwer to Freeport, and I went to the wizard guild in town to see what quests they had.  Everyone I talked to, after going
ygData.messageBody:
I recently made the trip from Faydwer to Freeport, and I went to the wizard
guild in town to see what quests they had. Everyone I talked to, after
going through the dialog, when I got to the point where they would give the
actual quest, always said something to the effect that "The word is that you
are neither friend nor foe. You need to prove yourself with us first".
What do I need to do so I cam actually get quests from the humans? I am a
High Elf Wizard.

-Shadowwalker of Karana
